Class AntennaTurtle

java.lang.Object
  TurtleDecorator
      AntennaTurtle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Turtle
public class AntennaTurtle
extends TurtleDecorator

Another "fractalizing" decorator for turtles, this one creating a self-similar pattern of antennas.

Author:
Ilkka Kokkarinen

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class TurtleDecorator
turtle
 
Constructor Summary
AntennaTurtle(Turtle turtle, double cutoff)
          Decorate the underlying turtle to create an antenna pattern.
 
Method Summary
 void move(double dist)
          The antenna motion is implemented by a couple of turns and moves, ending the turtle with the same position and heading as if the move had been done directly as given.

Constructor Detail

AntennaTurtle

public AntennaTurtle(Turtle turtle,
                     double cutoff)
Decorate the underlying turtle to create an antenna pattern.

Parameters:
turtle - The underlying turtle to decorate.
cutoff - The threshold for motion length to fractalize into an antenna.
Method Detail

move

public void move(double dist)
The antenna motion is implemented by a couple of turns and moves, ending the turtle with the same position and heading as if the move had been done directly as given.

Specified by:
move in interface Turtle
Overrides:
move in class TurtleDecorator
Parameters:
dist - The distance to move forward to the current heading.
